raw_text: Three metrics have been commonly used for evaluating co reference performance over an unrestricted set of entity types: i) The link based MUC metric (Vilain et al, 1995), ii) The mention based B-CUBED metric (Bagga and Baldwin, 1998) and iii) The entity based CEAF (Constrained Entity Aligned F-measure) metric (Luo, 2005)
clean_text: Three metrics have been commonly used for evaluating coreference performance over an unrestricted set of entity types: i) The link based MUC metric (Vilain et al, 1995), ii) The mention based B-CUBED metric (Bagga and Baldwin, 1998) and iii) The entity based CEAF (Constrained Entity Aligned F-measure) metric (Luo, 2005).
